One&Only Hayman Island allures guests with mouth-watering flavors Published on : Tuesday, August 18, 2015
With seven diverse restaurants and bars, each with rare character, Australia’s most comprehensive on-island cellar and One&Only bespoke dining experiences, One&Only Hayman Island is a true epicurean haven, set amidst the incomparable natural beauty of the tropical Whitsundays.
Fire– Signature Dining
Set on a tranquil lagoon, Fire is One&Only Hayman Island’s signature restaurant and most elegant dining experience.
The restaurant boasts one of Australia’s most impressive cellars, with an extensive local and international wine list and one of the largest collections of back-vintages of Penfolds Grange in the country.
Fire’s cuisine is quintessentially Australian, with a menu celebrating the very best of the country’s fresh and abundant seasonal produce and as the name suggests, an emphasis on grills.
Bamboo – Pan-Asian
Authentic Asian cuisine, sleek decor, gracious service and the option to dine under the stars come together to create one of the resort’s most memorable dining experiences.
Bamboo’s menu features fresh, seasonal Pan-Asian cuisine showcasing the best of Australian produce. Chef Grant describes Bamboo’s approach as relaxed and uncomplicated, “Eastern style is characterized by simplicity.”
For guests who opt to dine outdoors, intimate dining platforms are scattered throughout the bamboo grove, or there is the ceremonial tea house, providing a magical garden setting for a private group or family dinner.
Amici – Family Italian
Amici offers a lively Italian experience, a nod to its namesake, ‘friends’ in Italian, a warm, restaurant where tradition meets simplicity.
Chef Grant and his team keep the focus on fresh, hearty fare true to Amici’s Italian heritage, with an extensive menu of hand-crafted pastas, home-made ricotta, pesto and sauces.
Amici’s wine list features vintages handpicked from the regions of Tuscany, Piedmont and Veneto as well as a range of Italian aperitifs, including Limoncello and Orangecello produced on the island.
On the Rocks – Barefoot Chic
On the Rocks is One&Only Hayman Island’s chic poolside bar and restaurant, a leisurely oasis set against the spectacular backdrop of the Coral Sea and the Whitsunday Islands beyond.
On the Rocks serves fresh, simple fare, with a focus on grilled seafood, salads, gourmet sandwiches and creative small plates. The bar menu features a great selection of signature cocktails, mocktails and wines, as well as a wide choice of local and international beers.
Aquazure – Coral Sea Views
Aquazure is the perfect day to evening experience for guests of all ages. Located on the beachfront, and near the family pool, Aquazure combines a lively open bar with both indoor and alfresco dining, as well as the ability for guests to enjoy from their cabanas, day beds or sun lounges.
Aquazure’s menu is focused on fresh, local ingredients prepared simply, with Mediterranean-inspired salads and grills, and Spanish accents such as light tapas and paella to share.
Pacific – Beachfront Dining
Pacific, One&Only Hayman Island’s beachfront all day dining restaurant. True to its name, Pacific is a place to linger and enjoy one of the island’s most spectacular settings, and offers a generous breakfast buffet with a barista, fresh pancakes, freshly baked pastries and eggs made to order, as well as a range of healthy options such as detox juices, fruit smoothies and vitality juices created from herbs grown in the island’s garden.
Bar Fifty – A Place to Relax
Celebrating a special milestone in Hayman history, Bar Fifty is named in honour of the year, 1950, that saw the opening of the original Royal Hayman Hotel on the island. Located at the heart of the resort, Bar Fifty offers stylish indoor and outdoor lounge areas, and is the perfect place to relax after a day exploring the island and its magnificent surrounds.
The bar comes alive as a pre- and post-dinner venue, with an impressive wine library showcasing a great selection of new and old-world wines, both current and back vintages. Guests can enjoy billiards, Shisha, hand rolled cigars and an extensive list of scotches, cognacs and vintage champagnes. An exclusive enclave, Bar Fifty is perfectly suited to draw a romantic evening to an end or for winding down with friends under the stars.
One&Only Bespoke Dining Experiences
In addition to its restaurants and bars, One&Only Hayman Island offers a variety of bespoke dining experiences, tailored to guests needs and offering unique ways to enjoy the incredible beauty of the iconic private island setting. From intimate dining in cabanas set in lush tropical gardens to a gourmet beach picnic on white sands overlooking the Coral Sea, or the island’s signature gourmet experiences, the chefs of One&Only Hayman Island ensure that dining on the island is a truly unforgettable experience.
